General.Name: Dongguan Dingtong Precision Metal Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Dongguan Dingtong Precision Metal Co., Ltd. engages in the product development, mold manufacturing, parts processing, precision injection molding, connector assembly, and automatic over molding activities in China. The company also offers precision dies, precision mold parts, high-speed communication connectors, and automotive connectors. In addition, it provides insert molding and waterproof sealing type automotive connectors for automobile factory. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Dongguan, China.
